alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:26PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rockingham and east central Hillsborough Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 326 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Manchester, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Derry, Salem, Merrimack, Bedford, Litchfield, Raymond, Londonderry, Hampstead, Auburn, Chester, Sandown and Windham. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 between mile markers 1 and 2. Interstate 93 between mile markers 6 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
